meanings.definition: A collection of preserved plant specimens for scientific study.
meanings.sent1: The herbarium contained many different types of plants for research.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study plants by examining specimens in the herbarium.
meanings.sent3: The herbarium was so full of plants that it looked like a mini forest!
meanings.sent4: In the herbarium, each plant specimen is like a piece of history waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the herbarium felt like stepping into a garden frozen in time.

meanings.definition: A building or room where such specimens are stored and displayed.
meanings.sent1: The herbarium building had shelves lined with plant specimens from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the variety of plants on display in the herbarium.
meanings.sent3: When the door to the herbarium opened, it was like entering a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: The herbarium room was a treasure trove of botanical wonders waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming into the herbarium made the plants look even more vibrant.
